arts.ttl: Serie A | Genoa 2-0 Venezia: Pinamonti and Cornet earn Grifone late win
arts.sum: Andrea Pinamonti and Maxwel Cornet curled two spectacular efforts home in the last ten minutes...

arts.ttl: Genoa vs. Venezia to finish off matchday 25
arts.sum: After the 2-0 win in the reverse match on 21st September 2024, Venezia could win both matches in a season against Genoa for the first time in Serie A; Overall, only between 1943 and 1946 did the Venetians win two consecutive games against the Grifone in the top-flight. Venezia have conceded goals in each of their last 19 league games, the longest current streak among the teams currently in Serie A; the Lagunari`s last clean sheet in the competition came back in the reverse fixture against Genoa (2-0 on 21st September 2024).

Genoa are coming off a controversial draw on the road last week, as they held Torino to a point apiece. Meanwhile, Venezia remain five points off of safety after losing 1-0 to Roma on Sunday. Venezi...
